subject: Welcome to the team
text:
Hey there,

Great to finally have you on our squad, hope you will settle in alright. I trust that you will make yourself at home. There's not a lot of time to get you up to speed, we have assigned you to a new case already.

You've already found the Inbox. Here you'll find emails from your colleagues as you advance your investigation. They can contain leads that may help you so if you see the little red unread symbol, be sure to check it out.

Next up is the Person's database. Here you can look up any persons that are mentioned in the information you've gathered. Note that you have to search for the exact name (both first and last name).

The File's database works just like the Person's database, there you'll find important documents related to the case. Our system is a little special though, so you'll have to search for the exact file id to get a match.

Finally, there's the Final report. When you feel you are ready to submit your final report to me you can fill it in. We'll go through the case together and evaluate how you did.

Best regards
Owen

subject: New Case: Death of a Tech CEO
text:
Hey again,

Call came in today, Steven Fisher (yes the Steven Fisher, CEO and founder of Bookface and Chirper) was found dead in his home. Officers at the scene reported that everything seems to point to an unlucky accident, he was found at the bottom of the stairs with a broken neck.

I don't know if it's just me, but I got a funny feeling about this one. There's been a lot of drama in the family recently, concerning some interesting images posted by his son. Also, powerful people make a lot of enemies, I'm just thinking we should at least dig a little deeper, you know?

A good place to start might be to look up the report the Officer's made, should be documented under CSI#772. Dig around a bit and when you're ready, submit a final report to me and we can evaluate the case together.

Good luck trooper,
Owen

subject: Help with telephone
text:
Hello,

My name is Elsa and I work at the IT department. We recieved Steven Fisher's phone but we have a problem. We are unable to access it. Maybe you are able to get some information from his wife (Elizabeth Fisher) and children (Ellen and Henry Fisher) which can help us unlock his telephone. You can access the telephone here.

Cheers,
Elsa
